personalInfo.name: Ahmed Soran
personalInfo.title: Full-Stack Developer
personalInfo.tagline: Passionate about creating innovative solutions with modern technologies
personalInfo.description: Specializing in JavaScript, Node.js, Go, and both SQL and NoSQL databases.

projects.title: CRM System
projects.description: A comprehensive customer relationship management system built with Node.js and React. Features include customer tracking, sales pipeline management, and analytics dashboard.

projects.title: ERP Solution
projects.description: Enterprise resource planning system for small to medium businesses. Includes inventory management, HR modules, and financial reporting.

projects.title: Landing Page Builder
projects.description: Drag-and-drop landing page builder with real-time preview. Built with modern React patterns and optimized for performance.

projects.title: Microfrontend Platform
projects.description: Scalable microfrontend architecture for large applications. Implements module federation and shared component libraries.

current.description: Leading development of enterprise applications, mentoring junior developers, and architecting scalable solutions for clients across various industries.
responsibilities: Lead a team of 5 developers in building scalable web applications
Architect and implement microservices using Node.js and Go
Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews
Collaborate with product managers to define technical requirements
Optimize application performance and ensure high availability

previous.description: Developed and maintained multiple client projects using modern web technologies.
